name: Potato & Leek Soup
recipeIngredient: 2 lb Leeks, white portions only, trimmed, carefully washed and thinly sliced
6 Cups Chicken stock, vegetable stock, or water
2 lb Baking potatoes, peeled, quatered lengthwise and thinly sliced salt and white pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In a large saucepan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the leeks and saute just until they begin to soften, 3-5 minutes. Add the stock and potatoes, bring to a boil, reduce the heat to low, cover and simmer until the potatoes are very tender, about 20 minutes.
Season to taste with salt and white pepper. Ladle into warmed bowls and garnish with the chives.
